exceptions.exn: In environment server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \ otin clients Huniq : uniq clients d : dstatelet m : mid H : ResourceCoh d Unable to unify "valid (post_msg (dsoup ?M1562) ?M1563).1 /\\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find m (post_msg (dsoup ?M1562) ?M1563).1 = Some ms -> active ms -> coh_msg ms)" with "let 'SimplFun lam := [Pred s | valid s /\\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find m s = Some ms -> active ms -> coh_msg ms)] in lam match find m (dsoup d) with | Some m0 => upd m (mark_msg m0) (dsoup d) | None => dsoup d end".

original: intros. unfold ResourceCoh, soup_coh, consume_msg. intros Hrescoh. apply soup_coh_post_msg. apply Hrescoh.
